Savor the Essence of India

Authentic Pavandev Masalas

Hand-ground with passion and tradition, our premium spices bring unparalleled flavor to every dish. Explore our exquisite range and elevate your culinary journey.

Our Exquisite Range of Masalas

Coriander Powder

Finely ground from the freshest coriander seeds, our powder adds a warm, citrusy, and slightly sweet aroma to curries, gravies, and marinades. A kitchen essential for authentic Indian flavors.

Egg Masala

A perfectly balanced blend of spices to create a rich, aromatic, and flavorful egg curry or scramble. Elevate your egg dishes with this special masala.

Jeera Powder

Made from premium roasted cumin seeds, our jeera powder offers a distinctive earthy and warm flavor. Ideal for tempering, seasoning, and adding depth to various Indian dishes.

Black Pepper Powder

Bold and pungent, our black pepper powder is freshly ground to deliver a sharp, spicy kick. Perfect for seasoning, marinades, and adding a zesty finish to any meal.

Kabab Powder

Crafted to perfection, this masala blend ensures your kebabs are tender, juicy, and bursting with authentic flavors. Ideal for both vegetarian and non-vegetarian kebabs.

Chicken Fry & Masala

A versatile blend for both frying and currying chicken. It imparts a rich, savory taste and a beautiful aroma, making your chicken dishes irresistible.

Mutton Fry & Masala

Specially formulated to tenderize and flavor mutton, this masala creates succulent and deeply aromatic mutton fries or curries. A must-have for meat lovers.

A-1 Chilli Powder

Our A-1 Chilli Powder delivers a vibrant red color and a fiery kick, perfect for adding heat and zest to your dishes. Made from the finest red chilies.

Garam Masala

The heart of Indian cooking, our garam masala is an aromatic blend of whole spices, roasted and ground to perfection. It adds warmth, depth, and a finishing touch to almost any Indian dish.
